#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int a[n+1];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    cin>>a[i];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        while(a[i]%5==0)
        a[i] /= 5;
        while(a[i]%3==0)
        a[i] /= 3;
    }
    sort(a,a+n);
    if(a[0]==a[n-1])
    cout<<"Yes\n";
    else
    cout<<"No\n";}
    return 0;
}
